argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpinv.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | grpinv.2 | |- U = ( GId ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grpinv.3 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_grpoinv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( ( N ` A ) G A ) = U /\ ( A G ( N ` A ) ) = U ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A G ( N ` A ) ) = U ) |
